title: april 2: i got a dollar [hosted by: Ricky Montgomery] (with CAL)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Ricky talks about the invention of the first iteration of the US dollar. Afterwards, he is joined by musical guest CAL. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
